title: Columbian Exposition medal
marks:
Signature and Inscription

URQ on front, in reli at bottom on front, in relief: [AUGUSTUS SAINT GAU
description: bronze medal from the Columbian Exposition of 1893 showing Columbus landing; reverse, with ship, torches, globe, winged figures and inscription, by C.E. Barber
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. E. Cohen
